simplesprint.notification.tooltip:
Notification after toggling sprint! 
%s - Quick message above your hotbar. 
%s - Send chat message. 
%s - Play notification sound.
simplesprint.info.title: What's going on here?
simplesprint.info.content:
Toggle Sprint is already in vanilla, why am I using this mod?! 
There isn't any keybind for toggling the toggle off. 
Have fun!
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.simplespr: Toggle Sprint, cuz why would you spam this sprint key bind?
